alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Grant; Miami (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:27AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Wabash, Grant, northwestern Blackford, western Huntington, southwestern Wells and southeastern Miami Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 227 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swayzee, or 8 miles west of Marion, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion and Sweetser around 235 AM EDT. Gas City and Jonesboro around 245 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include La Fontaine and Van Buren. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 258 and 278. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
